dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 6289 IH: Stop Climate Hysteria in Diplomacy Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Brecheen (for himself, Mr. Grothman, and Mr. Burlison) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Foreign Affairs

form.official-title: To provide that Executive Order 14027 shall have no force or effect.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Stop Climate Hysteria in Diplomacy Act.
Executive Order 14027 (86 Fed. Reg. 25947; relating to establishment of the climate change support office) shall have no force or effect.
